name: a (itch) (StuckArcader)
description:
This is a text based game where you control an a with text.

Commands:

• Right - Go Right

• Left - Go Left

• Up - Go Up

• Down - Go Down

• Menu - Return to menu

• Reset - Restart the level

• Quit - Leave the game

This game was made for an game jam (Phazor Game Jam)

A game jam is a game competition between game developers
